sentences: Kas sa siis t채naseks mind kutsud? V천i lihtsalt unustad?
Miks nad mind ei kutsud? Ei, see teine k체simus ongi heledam, miks nad mind juba kutsid?
context: The word 'kutsud' is the second person plural form of the verb 'kutsma', which means to invite in Estonian. It is used when addressing multiple people or a group.
